RelatedSentence: Maryville College graduates smile as they march in during the processional Sunday at the 2014 graduation ceremony on the lawn of Maryville College .
Commencement Speaker Dr. James Ethier addresses the Maryville College graduating class Sunday as Dr. Barbara Wells listens from the podium .
